meanings.definition: Acceptance of what happens without active response or resistance.
meanings.sent1: Her passiveness in the face of criticism surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The passiveness of the audience during the lecture was noticeable.
meanings.sent3: His passiveness towards the exciting news was comical.
meanings.sent4: The passiveness of the lake mirrored her calm demeanor.
meanings.sent5: The passiveness of the cat as it lazily stretched out in the sun was adorable.

meanings.definition: The state of being inactive or not participating.
meanings.sent1: The passiveness of the machine indicated it was turned off.
meanings.sent2: His passiveness in group projects often led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: The passiveness of the clock made it seem broken.
meanings.sent4: The passiveness of the forest in winter was eerie.
meanings.sent5: The passiveness of the old car hinted at its long history of neglect.
